name: imploring
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
showing in a very sincere, emotional, and determined way that you want someone to do or not do something : He had an imploring look in his eyes. She looked at his imploring face, and felt a stab of guilt.
More examplesFewer examples"Help me," begged Isabel, holding out an imploring hand.He has yet to hear anything, despite several imploring letters and phone calls.Her voice was weak and had an imploring quality.
